dmca.title: Re:  Logo
dmca.body:
Dear [Private], [Private], [Private] and [Private]:

I am writing to you on behalf of Mr. Doyle Yoder, President, DYP, Inc., Berlin, Ohio, regarding your use of The Family Gathering Company Logo. Mr. Yoder and I became aware recently of the Company Logo of The Family Gathering that appears prominently at the top of the home page at http://www.familygatheringfurniture.com.

The purpose of my letter is to inform you that the company logo image that you use to advertise and promote your company, The Family Gathering, includes an illegally created copy, or derivative, of one of Yoder
dmca.recipient_name: The Family Gathering; E-Market Media, Inc.
